name: ZERO (palibacsi)
description:
ZERO Demo

Test your mind, reflexes and skills in ZERO. Try to solve the puzzles in different ways in this first person logical plaftormer game.  

Make use of every object of the level to reach your goal. The white objects are your best friends, with those you can go forward in relative safety. Stay away from the red objects, they are pretty dangerous. The green objects are moving, so be careful, they can cause trouble sometimes. The blue objects are the teleports, but beware because they can be tricky. The yellow objects are the jumppads, with them you can reach places much faster. Always follow the purple light, because that’s gonna be your goal in every map. 

!!! The demo doesn't include save system !!!

This Demo contains:
4 tutorial levels
5 difficulty levels
1 credis level & 1 super secret level

Controls:
Use WSAD to move
Shift for sprint
Space for jump
If you stuck somewhere use R button, to restart the level

Some useful tips:
You can control your movement in the air
You can jump longer when you use sprint and jump at once

Feature list:
- Awesome soundtracks
- Retro-synthwave-wireframe-neon artstyle
- Cool gravity technology
- Fast paced gamestyle

Music by:
Donát Baracsi
